forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 68. South southeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy. High near 85, with temperatures falling to around 82 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms Likely then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 8pm. Partly cloudy. Low around 65, with temperatures rising to around 67 overnight. Northwest wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 84. North northeast wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Overnight

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
